†Phlyctaenaspinae Hay 1929: 651 (subfamily) †

[name only, but in reference to †phlyctaenaspids Stensiö 1925 , and used as valid by Romer 1945: 574 and by Romer 1966: 348 Art. 13.2.1; senior objective synonym of † Phlyctaeniidae ]

(family) †

not preoccupied by †
